name: Little Chefs: CO-OP
description:
In this game you will have a great time with your friends with co-op mode up to 4 players! You will have to cook different dishes in total chaos, where your team will be required to work together.


Build mode competently allows you to improve your kitchen by building new things that will be unlocked as your character levels up. Thus, with each new round the game will only get more interesting!


Do you like to customize? Welcome to our game! Complete daily tasks and get valuable currency, which you can use to customize both your character and your kitchen! Don't worry, if you're not a game host, you can still change the lobby leader's kitchen! It'll be a surprise for him!


In addition to the standard progressive mode, you'll be able to play procedural map generation mode. The next round will be completely different from the last. No more routine!

Improve your character by increasing his different characteristics that give bonuses! And also remember: the higher the level of your character - the more recipes for cooking are available to you!
